description.narrative: This activity (Punjab School Education Programme TA) is a component of Punjab School Education Programme I reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,597,678. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Education facilities and training, Teacher training. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Ernst & Young Pakistan, Institute of Social and Policy Sciences, McKinsey & Company. The start date is 16-06-2009 and the end date is 30-06-2014.

participating-org.narrative: Institute of Social and Policy Sciences
